Name: Wormskull
About the game: Following in the wake of the much enjoyed RPG Ashes of the Night, Wormskull emerges as prequel of its predecessor. Main Characters Duncan and Maduin take lead in this adventure, in constant haste with impending doom chasing them everywhere they go. Players will enjoy the ability to create & tailor each individual characters attributes the way they please. In Battle skills will regularly improve upon their usage. Other notable mentions are the players option to create their own equipment and potions, along with some other treats to help bring the world to life. Wormskull boasts an average play time of 25-35 hours. *Warning* This game is difficult. The opening scene challenges you and you will probably die... However... don't get frustrated! Once you get past the initial learning curve and get involved in the story you will appreciate the struggle you endured. *Made by a Solo Developer
